total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the positions of the number 2 in the input grid.
Q2: Draw a vertical line from the top to the bottom of the grid at the positions identified in Q1.
Q3: Draw a horizontal line from the left to the right of the grid at the positions identified in Q1.
Q4: Identify the square area formed by the intersection of the lines drawn in Q2 and Q3.
Q5: Fill the square area identified in Q4 with the number 1, keeping the lines of number 2 intact.
